getEncounters

protected static java.sql.ResultSet getEncounters(int formID,
                                                  java.lang.String table,

                                                  int siteID,
                                                  java.lang.String dateField,
                                                  java.sql.Connection conn)
                                           throws javax.servlet.ServletException
This is a special version of this query appropriate for forms like safe motherhood that have many date entry fields.

Parameters:
formID - The id of the form
table - The table that stores the form's submissions
beginDate - The first date of the report's time frame
endDate - The last date of the report's time frame
dateField - The date field to use for the query
conn -
Returns:
Returns a ResultSet containing all patient Encounters pertaining to this form during the time frame.
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException

getEncounters

protected static java.sql.ResultSet getEncounters(int formID,
                                                  java.lang.String table,
                                                  java.sql.Date beginDate,
                                                  java.sql.Date endDate,
                                                  int siteID,
                                                  java.lang.String dateField1,
                                                  java.lang.String dateField2,
                                                  java.sql.Connection conn)
                                           throws javax.servlet.ServletException
This is a special version of this query appropriate for forms like safe motherhood that have many date entry fields. This one lets you check two date fields.

Parameters:
formID - The id of the form
table - The table that stores the form's submissions
beginDate - The first date of the report's time frame
endDate - The last date of the report's time frame
dateField1 - The date field to use for the query
conn -
Returns:
Returns a ResultSet containing all patient Encounters pertaining to this form during the time frame.
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException
